Package com.Akif

Class MaxHeap

java.lang.Object
com.Akif.MaxHeap
public class MaxHeap
extends java.lang.Object
This class is to handle heap operations by using ArrayList.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MaxHeap()
    No parameter constructor to initialize ArrayList.
    MaxHeap​(java.util.Comparator<AgeData> comparator)
    No parameter constructor to initialize ArrayList and a Comparator.

    Insert an item into the heap.
    AgeData find​(AgeData item)
    Find the AgeData object with the same age and return it.
    boolean isEmpty()
    Returns true if this heap contains no elements.
    int olderThan​(int age)
    Returns the number of people older than given age.

    Remove an item from the heap.

    Returns a string representation of this heap.

    Returns the number of people younger than given age.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public boolean add​(AgeData item)
      Insert an item into the heap. pre: The ArrayList data is in heap order.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to be inserted
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the item to be inserted is null.

    • remove

      public AgeData remove​(AgeData item)
      Remove an item from the heap. pre: The ArrayList data is in heap order.
      Returns:
      The removed element value or null if empty.

    • find

      public AgeData find​(AgeData item)
      Find the AgeData object with the same age and return it.
      Parameters:
      item - an AgeData object of any age.
      Returns:
      Same age AgeData object with given parameter.
